title: HERCULES GONE MAD - PART ONE: Rebels for Love
description:
from the book's Amazon page:

When the World Order collapses,
when the Revolution of Neo-Collectivism prevails,
when the Angel of Death strikes out for its final, global purging,
what is a disgraced and discharged Special Forces Warrior to do?

He goes mad...

----

HERCULES GONE MAD and each subsequent book of the HEROES OF DYSTOPIA Saga will be released in a serialized format, as books were once released in the classic tradition of science fiction writing of days past. This is being done so that, hopefully, new editions can get out to you quickly, get your feedback, and incorporate that feedback just as quickly into subsequent editions. Needless to say, your feedback and support will be critical to this expedited serialized process.

Hercules Gone Mad Part Two is coming soon!

----

who are the heroes
the heroes of dystopia
who will rise the dawn
